gil.web.resources
Class LogfilesResource

java.lang.Object
  gil.web.resources.LogfilesResource

public class LogfilesResource
extends java.lang.Object

REST resource class for retrieving a list of logfiles as well as downloading individual logfiles.

Constructor Summary
LogfilesResource()
           
 
Method Summary
 javax.ws.rs.core.Response getLogfile(java.lang.String name)
          Returns the requested logfile as binary data stream.
 javax.ws.rs.core.Response getLogfiles(java.lang.String format, javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo)
          Returns a list of available logfiles in either json, xml or html format.
